channel.title: Hmm
channel.description:
is there anyway i can make this for NPC's and if so how?

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @H20wnage H20wnage
item.description:
@H20wnage wrote:

thats about as pain as my Language gets but its not Really to simple but its kinda like what u had but
the problem is if there is a int defined to do the Area attacking so like

public static int [] newNpc
public static int [] ID
public static int [] xcoord
public static int [] ycoord
Define the ints then make it so that the Data looks kinda like this

NewNpc ("444") ("2453,2456")'

or something like that i aint ever been the best at this -.-[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2008, 06:47:29 PM[/size][hr]it works kinda like NPC walking or Spawning just Change one of them up to work Like u want

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @H20wnage H20wnage
item.description:
@H20wnage wrote:

wait u said attacksplayers not NPC so like if u want it to be it only attacks players withen a Defined space of them. use something like Method or Void (“ID”) (“X,Y”); so u would have to Create or if u already have an Int that Tells Npcs to auto Attack then U add the Part Of the X,Y so i think u got it but if the Void AttackWithen Isent Defined with a Specific Part of Data it would not work.

so Define a int for AttackArea or something call it what ever then Make it Grab Data form Like ./CFG/Attackwithen.CFG then Enter in the attack withen CFG
like this
ID CoordX CoordY so
444 2654 2648

Read full topic
